data.title: The Top Ranked Baseball Players from the State of New York
data.text:
The Top Ranked Baseball Players of All-Time from New York

Notes: This is a list of the greatest pro players that were born in this state.

Where players grew up or went to school does not factor into this list.

Ranking Explanation
